job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the creation and enhancement of software platforms, which are core to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets.
job_tasks.justification: Troubleshooting, maintenance, and updates of tools are all part of the software development lifecycle and ensuring operational readiness.

job_tasks.phrase: creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
job_tasks.justification: Creating an assistant that guides customers implies designing and implementing AI-driven conversational models.

job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer
job_tasks.justification: Testing and integrating specific AI technologies like GPT-4 Vision and CodeWhisperer directly involves working with and applying AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the practical application and integration of technologies into existing workflows, a key software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS,
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and enhancing performance and integration across infrastructures points to operational concerns for deployed AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring end-user support and maintaining service quality relates to the operational and user-facing aspects of developed software.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_tasks.justification: This phrase clearly outlines the business objectives of improving client support and boosting innovation capacity.

soft_skills.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams
troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets.
ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and integration of LLMs and specific generative AI technologies like GPT-4 Vision and CodeWhisperer. It also mentions building user-facing platforms and working with frameworks like LangChain (implied by the nature of the tasks), aligning directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
